narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Reading Hospital is a Surgery provider based in West Reading, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $58.3M in Medicaid payments across 1.6M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $58.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
